groups.name: financer.eureka
groups.description: Configuration properties for Financer Eureka Integration Library.

properties.name: financer.eureka.local-url
properties.description: URL of the Eureka Server for local development environment.

properties.name: financer.eureka.docker-url
properties.description: URL of the Eureka Server for Docker environment.

properties.name: financer.eureka.prefer-ip-address
properties.description: Whether to prefer IP address over hostname for service registration.

properties.name: financer.eureka.register-with-eureka
properties.description: Whether to register this service with Eureka.

properties.name: financer.eureka.fetch-registry
properties.description: Whether to fetch registry information from Eureka.

properties.name: financer.eureka.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout for Eureka client in seconds.

properties.name: financer.eureka.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout for Eureka client in seconds.

properties.name: financer.eureka.enable-health-check
properties.description: Whether to enable health check via Eureka.

properties.name: financer.eureka.docker.prefer-ip-address
properties.description: Whether to prefer IP address over hostname in Docker environment.
